title: 祭りは準備が肝要ってな

text.jpText:
イナリワンはクラスメイトに、
地方でおさまらない実力があるから
転入してきたと勘違いされて、内心憤る。
text.enText:
Inari One is mistakenly believed by her 
classmates to be a transfer because she has 
abilities that cannot be contained in the 
local area. She is angry inside because her 
classmates mistakenly think that she has 
moved to the city because she is not good 
enough to stay in the local area.

text.jpText:
地方のウマ娘が中央より劣っているとは、
絶対に言わせたくない。しかし、今の自分が
主張しても、誰も聞く耳を持たないだろう。
text.enText:
I would never let anyone tell me that local 
horsegirl are inferior to central Japan. 
However, even if I were to claim this now, no 
one would listen to me. I am sure that no one 
will listen to me even if I insist.

text.jpText:
だから、皆が自分の言葉を無視できなくなる
くらいデカい存在になり、地方は中央に
劣っていないと宣言することを目指す。
text.enText:
Therefore, the goal is to become so big 
that everyone will not be able to ignore 
your words and declare that the regions 
are not inferior to the central regions. 
and declare that the regions are not 
inferior to the center.

text.jpText:
イナリワンの新しい目標に向けて、
ジュニア級の武者修行が始まろうとしていた。
text.enText:
Inari One's junior-level training was about 
to begin as she set her sights on a new goal.
